conbody.p: The matrix cell element contains the aggregate values to display in the resulting matrix. This single cell, defined at design time, is repeated for each intersection of rows and columns at runtime. The cell can hold either a domain attribute item or a computed item. Computed values are also aggregated on rows and columns.
You can organize the values presentation in multiple lines, as well as adapt horizontal and vertical alignment, thanks to horizontal and vertical boxes that you can drop into the cell.
